name: Feed Me Hot Pink Mixtapes
description:
Who knows what on earth is on these mixtapes?

The Hungry Opinionated Tape Deck does.

Collect them one at a time & feed them to it to find out what they contain.

Use the arrows to move along the platforms & up/down the piles of CDs & 7" singles.

Use the arrows to scroll through the dialog.

Made with Bitsy for the Mixtape Jam.
